name: Hotel Novotel Moscow Sheremetyevo Airport

reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews of the Novotel, I was very apprehensive about staying in this hotel, but it was not as bad as the previous reviewer's review....
reviews.title: Not Bad
Novatel is very nice
reviews.text: We stayed on the 8th floor where I suppose most of the superior rooms are.... Our room was very basic and sparsely furnished with a king size bed and a sofa bed that could accomodate one person. We were a family of four but there were only 2 towels in the bathroom and three uncomfortable pillows ... We called to ask for extra pillows and towels but after 45 minutes gave up as it was already 12:30AM by then and we wanted to go to sleep.

reviews.title: Rip off hotel in Moscow
reviews.text: The service of the hotel is not the best as you could glean form our experience with the towels and pillow....and their shuttle drivers were the most unfriendly shuttle drivers we have ever encountered...they don't smile and they do not help you with your luggage. However the Check in service was okay.

description: The Novotel Moscow Sheremetyevo is located at Sheremetyevo International Airport, 30 km from the centre of Moscow. This 4 star hotel with refurbished rooms caters to business travelers with six conference rooms and WiFi internet. Relax at the hotel bar and enjoy international and Russian cuisine at Fusion Grill&Bar. Unwind with our pool, gym and sauna. Free airport shuttle and secure parking. 15 km from the Crocus Expo exhibition centre.
